Message:
Something made
the other Charlotte
go on a rampage again.

A man with a staff
cheered me up, saying,

“It must have been
tough being all alone.”

Alone?
What are you talking about?
She’s with me...
He’s got me all figured out.

He knew exactly what was
hidden under my happy mask...

Having learned everything,
he held his hand out
to me and said,

But I already
had my answer—
I’m...gonna trust him.

If this ends up being
some kind of trick,

So I prayed that this man
wouldn’t betray me,
and took his hand,
hoping I could finally say
goodbye to my happy mask.
